extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for alliances, accessible via /alliances/*

    • Method Detail

      • createAlliance

        public java.lang.String createAlliance(java.lang.String allianceName,
                                       long creatorId)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        The function that creates a new alliance. Requires a POST request It accomplishes this by creating a text file somewhere in the /server directory with all the alliance information. Accessible via /alliances/create.
        Parameters:
        allianceName - The name of the alliance
        creatorId - The id of the creator of the alliance
        Returns:
        A message affirming the creation of the alliance
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • addToAlliance

        public java.lang.String addToAlliance(java.lang.String aName,
                                      java.lang.Long uId)
                               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                      java.io.IOException
        Adds a user to the given alliance. Accessible via /alliances/add, requires a POST request
        Parameters:
        aName - The name of the alliance
        uId - The ID of the nation to be added
        Returns:
        A message affirming the creation of the alliance, or an error otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • getAlliances

        public java.lang.String getAlliances(java.lang.String allianceName)
                              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                     org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
        Gets a particular alliance from the database.
        Parameters:
        allianceName - The name of the alliance
        Returns:
        A string representation of the JSON object representing the alliance, or a message saying that it failed if it didn't find the alliance.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException

      • findAllianceByAllianceName

        public java.util.Collection<Alliances> findAllianceByAllianceName(java.lang.String name)
        Finds an alliance by the name by using the AllianceRepository.java class.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the alliance to request
        Returns:
        A Collection of all alliances found with the name

      • findAllianceById

        public java.util.Collection<Alliances> findAllianceById(int id)
        Finds an alliance by the id by using the AllianceRepository.java class
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the requested alliance
        Returns:
        A collection of all alliances found with the id
